import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet'; import './Seguimiento.css'; import Paho from 'paho-mqtt'; const Seguimiento = () => { const client = new Paho.MQTT.Client("192.168.0.105", 9001, "CatBenderson2"); client.onConnectionLost = onConnectionLost; client.onMessageArrived = onMessageArrived; useEffect(() => { listaEmpleados(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); return (
< MapContainer className='leaflet-map' center={[19.494102, -96.91589]} zoom={13} scrollWheelZoom={false} > {/* Tadaa! Here's where I live */}
